q: half, Microsoft will release a second, more significant update to the OS. It will include fast switching of third-party applications and a significant upgrade to Internet Explorer 9, optimized for hardware acceleration on Windows Phone. We will bring multitasking to Windows Phone this year, Steve Ballmer said. And in the second half,`` we'll be able to give people the full Internet on their phone...[ the Internet] will be a first-class citizen on the phone.''

with Gabrielle Giffords ' husband, astronaut Mark Kelly, on Saturday night. He described the latest progress in his critically injured wife's recovery.`` She's making progress every day,'' Kirsten Gillibrand said. She's using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing. So... it's an extraordinary amount of progress for a woman who sustained such a horrific injury that she did. The University of Arizona said in a news release Sunday that Gabrielle Giffords ' condition had been upgraded from critical to serious because she is no longer on a ventilator. Both capture why Andy Coulson 's resignation matters, if not to the general swell of British politics, at least to internal operations in Coalitionville. article for the Guardian is captured by its headline: Andy Coulson Couslon had a nose for the view of the aspirational voter. But it also homes in on the point that Andy Coulson 's departure tilts No. 10 in favour of Steve Hilton - something that will bother the Tory right far more than it does Lib Dems of any persuasion. I regret the remark, which I consider inappropriate. As long as it's exciting, he said in response to a question about his plans. Eric Schmidt , 55, may be considering a career as a television host, the New York Post reported yesterday. Michael Jordan jumper was deadly.'' Using mostly jump shots, Allen Iverson went 20-of-30 from the field. He also hit 10-of-13 free-throw attempts en route to his third career 50-point game and first since February 6 against Sacramento. When your jumper is on, the basket seems like an ocean and the basketball seems like a rock, he said.`` That is the way it felt tonight.`` Rafer Alston teammates are the ones that set the screens for me and got me the ball in spots where Elgin Baylor need the ball.
